## MapView.(constructor)

Constructs a new `MapView` with the given options or canvas element.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(options: MapViewOptions);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | [MapViewOptions](./harp-mapview.mapviewoptions.md) | The <code>MapView</code> options or the HTML canvas element used to display the map. |
